'''Robert Charles Griffiths''', [[Fellow of the Royal Society|FRS]] is an [[Australian]] [[mathematician]] and [[statistician]] known for his work in mathematical [[population genetics]]. He is Professor of Mathematical [[Genetics]] in the [[University of Oxford]] and a fellow and tutor at [[Lady Margaret Hall]].

He was elected a [[Fellow of the Royal Society]] in 2010.<ref>http://royalsociety.org/New-Fellows-2010-D-G/</ref>
